trans-unit.source: An activity used to explicitly invoke the compensation handler of a <xref href="System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 用於明確叫用補償處理常式活動<xref href="System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Activities.Statements.Compensate"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Activities.Statements.Compensate"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref:System.WorkflowModel.InArgument%601> that contains the <xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensationHandle> for this <xref href="System.Activities.Statements.Compensate"></xref> activity.

When the Target of the <xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensationHandle> is specified, the <xref:System.Activities.Statements.Compensate> activity explicitly invokes the compensation handler of <xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity>, which returns the <xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensationHandle>.
trans-unit.target: 當目標的<xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensationHandle>指定，則<xref:System.Activities.Statements.Compensate>活動會明確叫用補償處理常式，<xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity>它會傳回<xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensationHandle>.</xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensationHandle> </xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity> </xref:System.Activities.Statements.Compensate> </xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensationHandle>

trans-unit.source: When the Target of the <xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensationHandle> is not specified, the <xref:System.Activities.Statements.Compensate> activity invokes the default compensation for any child <xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity> activities in the reverse order of successful completion.
trans-unit.target: 當目標的<xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensationHandle>未指定，<xref:System.Activities.Statements.Compensate>活動叫用預設補償之任何子系<xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity>成功完成的反向順序中的活動。</xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity> </xref:System.Activities.Statements.Compensate> </xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensationHandle>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.> InvalidOperationException?qualifyHint=False&autoUpgrade=True is thrown if the Target refers to a <xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity> that was previously confirmed or compensated.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.>InvalidOperationException？ qualifyHint = False & autoUpgrade = True 會擲回，如果目標是指<xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity>先前已確認或補償。</xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity> </xref:System.>

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only at runtime.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性是唯讀，在執行階段。

trans-unit.source: If the value is set at runtime, an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> is raised.
trans-unit.target: 如果在執行階段設定值<xref:System.InvalidOperationException>，就會引發。</xref:System.InvalidOperationException>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.WorkflowModel.InArgument%601> that contains the <xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensationHandle> for this <xref href="System.Activities.Statements.Compensate"></xref>.
